details.purpose: To record a summary of a patient safety event associated with medication for reporting purposes.
*To record a summary of a patient safety event associated with medication for reporting purposes.(en)

items.items: Summary of a patient safety event associated with medication for reporting purposes.
The category of event reported using MedDRA classification.
The date and/or time that the adverse event took place.
The clinical intervention undertaken to resolve or ameliorate the adverse effect, uses PCNE terminology.
The result(s) of any interventions undertaken, recorded using MEDRA classification subset.
Details of one or more side effects.
Triggers thought to be related to this safety event recorded using IHCI classification.
Description of the side-effect reported or observed using MEDRA or ATC codes.
An estimate of how likely the side-effects noted are due to the safety event.
A narrative description of the medication safety event.
The overall impact actually experienced by the patient.
The caetgory of impact on the patient's life.
[A] Circumstances or events that have the capacity to cause error
[B] An error that did not reach the patient
[C] An error that reached the patient but did not cause harm
[D] An error that reache the patient and reqired monitoring or intervention to confirm that it resulted in no harm to the patient
[E] Temporary harm to the patient and required intervention
[F] Temporary harm to the patient and required initial or prolonged hospitalization
The reason suspected for this event occurring.
Written miscomunication-Non metric units of measurement
Packaging-Error due to similarity to another drug (colour, form, size)
The datetime at which the side effects began.
An assessment of potential impact on the patient if interventions had been unsuccesful. Uses the MERP index. other remediation had not occured.
Details of the estimated cause of the event.
An additional comment on the estimated cause of the event.
Is this the principal or main event recorded during the case?
Details included only in Case Summary.
Reason for the case being closed.
The therapy has been fully effective.
The therpay has been partially effective.
The therapy has been ineffective and the disease is progressing unchecked.
A link to the main case event.
The reason why the treatment was aborted.
Transfusion of Blood or Use of Blood Products
X-Ray or Doppler Studies for Emboli or Deep Vein Thrombosis
Decrease in Hemoglobin or Hematocrit of 25% or Greater
Partial Thromboplastin Time (PTT) Greater than 100 Seconds
Rising BUN or Serum Creatinine Two Times (2x) over Baseline
Mechanical Ventilation Greater than 24 Hours Post-Operatively
Intra-Operative Administration of Epinephrine, Norepinephrine, Naloxone, or Romazicon
Readmission to the Intensive Care Unit
Administration of Oxytocic Agents (such as oxytocin, methylergonovine, and 15-methyl-prostaglandin in the post-partum period)
Readmission to the ED within 48 Hours
Time in ED Greater than 6 Hours
*Intervencija preprečila, da bi zaplet dosegel pacienta(en)
*Intervencija popolnoma odpravila posledice, ki jih je zaplet povzročil pacientu(en)
*Intervencija delno odpravila posledice, ki jih je zaplet povzročil pacientu(en)
*Intervencija ni odpravila posledic, ki jih je zaplet povzročil pacientu(en)
An additional comment on the Reaction details.
An additional comment on the Actual patient outcome comment.
The medicine, vaccine or other therapetic good being ordered, administered to or used by the subject
Medications administered is used to enter wrongly administered drug for Safety event type *at0254 Pacient dobil drugo zdravilo od predpisanega* Wrong drug administered to a patient
This information is aplicable when at least one Intervention is Dose decreased or Drug discontinued
*Summary of a patient safety event associated with medication for reporting purposes.(en)
*The category of event reported using MedDRA classification.(en)
*The date and/or time that the adverse event took place.(en)
*The clinical intervention undertaken to resolve or ameliorate the adverse effect, uses PCNE terminology.(en)
*The result(s) of any interventions undertaken, recorded using MEDRA classification subset.(en)
*Details of one or more side effects.(en)
*Triggers thought to be related to this safety event recorded using IHCI classification.(en)
*Description of the side-effect reported or observed using MEDRA or ATC codes.(en)
*An estimate of how likely the side-effects noted are due to the safety event.(en)
*A narrative description of the medication safety event.(en)
*The overall impact actually experienced by the patient.(en)
*The caetgory of impact on the patient's life.(en)
[A] Okoliščine ali dogodki, ki lahko vodijo v zaplet
[B] Zaplet se je pojavil, vendar je bil ustavljen, preden je prišel do pacienta
[C] Zaplet se je pojavil, dosegel pacienta, vendar ni povzročil škode
[D] Zaplet je dosegel pacienta, potrebno je spremljanje, da se dokaže, da ni bilo storjene škode
[E] Zaplet je lahko vplival ali je vzrok za začasno škodo pri pacientu in zahteva intervencijo
[F] Zaplet je lahko vplival ali je vzrok za začasno škodo pri pacientu in zahteva podaljšano hospitalizacijo
[G] Zaplet je lahko vplival ali je vzrok za trajno škodo pri pacientu
[H] Zaplet zahteva intervencijo, da se ohrani pacienta pri življenju
[I] Pojavil se je zaplet, ki je lahko vplival ali je bil vzrok smrti pacienta
*The reason suspected for this event occurring.(en)
Ovojnina-napake zaradi podobnosti z drugim zdravilom (barva, oblika, velikost)
Ovojnina-napaka zaradi podobnosti z enakim zdravilom vendar druge jakosti
Pogoste motnje med delom (prekinitev dela, različni vzroki)
*The datetime at which the side effects began.(en)
*An assessment of potential impact on the patient if interventions had been unsuccesful. Uses the MERP index. other remediation had not occured.(en)
*Details of the estimated cause of the event.(en)
*An additional comment on the estimated cause of the event.(en)
*Is this the principal or main event recorded during the case?(en)
*The therapy has been ineffective and the disease is progressing unchecked.(en)
*A link to the main case event.(en)
*The reason why the treatment was aborted.(en)
Diagnostični postopki in preiskave na strdke ali globoko vensko trombozo
Padec hemoglobina ali hematokrita za 25% ali več
Porast dušika ali kreatinina za več kot 2X
Mehanska ventilacija več kot 24 ur po operaciji
Intraoperativna aplikacija adrenalina, noradrenalina, naloksona ali flumazenila
Aplikacija oksitocinskih derivatov (oksitocin, metilergonovin, 15-metil-prostaglandin) v poporodni dobi
Ponovni sprejem na enoto nujne pomoči v roku 48 ur
Obravnava na enoti nujne medicinske pomoči več kot 6 ur
Intervencija preprečila, da bi zaplet dosegel pacienta
Intervencija popolnoma odpravila posledice, ki jih je zaplet povzročil pacientu
Intervencija delno odpravila posledice, ki jih je zaplet povzročil pacientu
Intervencija ni odpravila posledic, ki jih je zaplet povzročil pacientu
*An additional comment on the Reaction details.(en)
*Medications administered is used to enter wrongly administered drug for Safety event type *at0254 Pacient dobil drugo zdravilo od predpisanega* Wrong drug administered to a patient(en)
